2468 condition_reg_ = (condition_reg_ & ~condition_mask) | condition;
2469 break;
2470 }
2471 case SUBFCX: {
2472 int rt = instr->RTValue();
2473 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2474 int rb = instr->RBValue();
2475 // int oe = instr->Bit(10);
2476 uintptr_t ra_val = get_register(ra);
2477 uintptr_t rb_val = get_register(rb);
2478 uintptr_t alu_out = ~ra_val + rb_val + 1;
2479 // Set carry
2480 if (ra_val <= rb_val) {
2481 special_reg_xer_ = (special_reg_xer_ & ~0xF0000000) | 0x20000000;
2482 } else {
2483 special_reg_xer_ &= ~0xF0000000;
2484 }
2485 set_register(rt, alu_out);
2486 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
2487 SetCR0(alu_out);
2488 }
2489 // todo - handle OE bit
2490 break;
2491 }
2492 case SUBFEX: {
2493 int rt = instr->RTValue();
2494 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2495 int rb = instr->RBValue();
2496 // int oe = instr->Bit(10);
2497 uintptr_t ra_val = get_register(ra);
2498 uintptr_t rb_val = get_register(rb);
2499 uintptr_t alu_out = ~ra_val + rb_val;
2500 if (special_reg_xer_ & 0x20000000) {
2501 alu_out += 1;
2502 }
2503 set_register(rt, alu_out);
2504 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
2505 SetCR0(static_cast<intptr_t>(alu_out));
2506 }
2507 // todo - handle OE bit
2508 break;
2509 }
2510 case ADDCX: {
2511 int rt = instr->RTValue();
2512 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2513 int rb = instr->RBValue();
2514 // int oe = instr->Bit(10);
2515 uintptr_t ra_val = get_register(ra);
2516 uintptr_t rb_val = get_register(rb);
2517 uintptr_t alu_out = ra_val + rb_val;
2518 // Set carry
2519 if (~ra_val < rb_val) {
2520 special_reg_xer_ = (special_reg_xer_ & ~0xF0000000) | 0x20000000;
2521 } else {
2522 special_reg_xer_ &= ~0xF0000000;
2523 }
2524 set_register(rt, alu_out);
2525 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
2526 SetCR0(static_cast<intptr_t>(alu_out));
2527 }
2528 // todo - handle OE bit
2529 break;
2530 }
2531 case ADDEX: {
2532 int rt = instr->RTValue();
2533 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2534 int rb = instr->RBValue();
2535 // int oe = instr->Bit(10);
2536 uintptr_t ra_val = get_register(ra);
2537 uintptr_t rb_val = get_register(rb);
2538 uintptr_t alu_out = ra_val + rb_val;
2539 if (special_reg_xer_ & 0x20000000) {
2540 alu_out += 1;
2541 }
2542 set_register(rt, alu_out);
2543 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
2544 SetCR0(static_cast<intptr_t>(alu_out));
2545 }
2546 // todo - handle OE bit
2547 break;
2548 }
2549 case MULHWX: {
2550 int rt = instr->RTValue();
2551 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2552 int rb = instr->RBValue();
2553 int32_t ra_val = (get_register(ra) & 0xFFFFFFFF);
2554 int32_t rb_val = (get_register(rb) & 0xFFFFFFFF);
2555 int64_t alu_out = (int64_t)ra_val * (int64_t)rb_val;
2556 // High 32 bits of the result is undefined,
2557 // Which is simulated here by adding random bits.
2558 alu_out = (alu_out >> 32) | 0x421000000000000;
2559 set_register(rt, alu_out);
2560 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
2561 SetCR0(static_cast<intptr_t>(alu_out));
2562 }
2563 break;
2564 }
2565 case MULHWUX: {
2566 int rt = instr->RTValue();
2567 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2568 int rb = instr->RBValue();
2569 uint32_t ra_val = (get_register(ra) & 0xFFFFFFFF);
2570 uint32_t rb_val = (get_register(rb) & 0xFFFFFFFF);
2571 uint64_t alu_out = (uint64_t)ra_val * (uint64_t)rb_val;
2572 // High 32 bits of the result is undefined,
2573 // Which is simulated here by adding random bits.
2574 alu_out = (alu_out >> 32) | 0x421000000000000;
2575 set_register(rt, alu_out);
2576 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
2577 SetCR0(static_cast<intptr_t>(alu_out));
2578 }
2579 break;
2580 }
2581 case MULHD: {
2582 int rt = instr->RTValue();
2583 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2584 int rb = instr->RBValue();
2585 int64_t ra_val = get_register(ra);
2586 int64_t rb_val = get_register(rb);
2587 int64_t alu_out = base::bits::SignedMulHigh64(ra_val, rb_val);
2588 set_register(rt, alu_out);
2589 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
2590 SetCR0(static_cast<intptr_t>(alu_out));
2591 }
2592 break;
2593 }
2594 case MULHDU: {
2595 int rt = instr->RTValue();
2596 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2597 int rb = instr->RBValue();
2598 uint64_t ra_val = get_register(ra);
2599 uint64_t rb_val = get_register(rb);
2600 uint64_t alu_out = base::bits::UnsignedMulHigh64(ra_val, rb_val);
2601 set_register(rt, alu_out);
2602 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
2603 SetCR0(static_cast<intptr_t>(alu_out));
2604 }
2605 break;
2606 }
2607 case NEGX: {
2608 int rt = instr->RTValue();
2609 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2610 intptr_t ra_val = get_register(ra);
2611 intptr_t alu_out = 1 + ~ra_val;
2612#if V8_TARGET_ARCH_PPC64
2613 intptr_t one = 1; // work-around gcc
2614 intptr_t kOverflowVal = (one << 63);
2615#else
2616 intptr_t kOverflowVal = kMinInt;
2617#endif
2618 set_register(rt, alu_out);
2619 if (instr->Bit(10)) { // OE bit set
2620 if (ra_val == kOverflowVal) {
2621 special_reg_xer_ |= 0xC0000000; // set SO,OV
2622 } else {
2623 special_reg_xer_ &= ~0x40000000; // clear OV
2624 }
2625 }
2626 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
2627 bool setSO = (special_reg_xer_ & 0x80000000);
2628 SetCR0(alu_out, setSO);
2629 }
2630 break;
2631 }
2632 case SLWX: {
2633 int rs = instr->RSValue();
2634 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2635 int rb = instr->RBValue();
2636 uint32_t rs_val = get_register(rs);
2637 uintptr_t rb_val = get_register(rb) & 0x3F;
2638 uint32_t result = (rb_val > 31) ? 0 : rs_val << rb_val;
2639 set_register(ra, result);
2640 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
2641 SetCR0(result);
2642 }
2643 break;
2644 }
2645#if V8_TARGET_ARCH_PPC64
2646 case SLDX: {
2647 int rs = instr->RSValue();
2648 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2649 int rb = instr->RBValue();
2650 uintptr_t rs_val = get_register(rs);
2651 uintptr_t rb_val = get_register(rb) & 0x7F;
2652 uintptr_t result = (rb_val > 63) ? 0 : rs_val << rb_val;
2653 set_register(ra, result);
2654 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
2655 SetCR0(result);
2656 }
2657 break;
2658 }
2659 case MFVSRD: {
2660 int frt = instr->RTValue();
2661 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2662 int64_t frt_val;
2663 if (!instr->Bit(0)) {
2664 // if double reg (TX=0).
2665 frt_val = get_d_register(frt);
2666 } else {
2667 // if simd reg (TX=1).
2668 DCHECK_EQ(instr->Bit(0), 1);
2669 frt_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<int64_t>(frt, 0);
2670 }
2671 set_register(ra, frt_val);
2672 break;
2673 }
2674 case MFVSRWZ: {
2675 DCHECK(!instr->Bit(0));
2676 int frt = instr->RTValue();
2677 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2678 int64_t frt_val = get_d_register(frt);
2679 set_register(ra, static_cast<uint32_t>(frt_val));
2680 break;
2681 }
2682 case MTVSRD: {
2683 int frt = instr->RTValue();
2684 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2685 int64_t ra_val = get_register(ra);
2686 if (!instr->Bit(0)) {
2687 // if double reg (TX=0).
2688 set_d_register(frt, ra_val);
2689 } else {
2690 // if simd reg (TX=1).
2691 DCHECK_EQ(instr->Bit(0), 1);
2692 set_simd_register_by_lane<int64_t>(frt, 0,
2693 static_cast<int64_t>(ra_val));
2694 // Low 64 bits of the result is undefined,
2695 // Which is simulated here by adding random bits.
2696 set_simd_register_by_lane<int64_t>(
2697 frt, 1, static_cast<int64_t>(0x123456789ABCD));
2698 }
2699 break;
2700 }
2701 case MTVSRDD: {
2702 int xt = instr->RTValue();
2703 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2704 int rb = instr->RBValue();
2705 set_simd_register_by_lane<int64_t>(
2706 xt, 0, static_cast<int64_t>(get_register(ra)));
2707 set_simd_register_by_lane<int64_t>(
2708 xt, 1, static_cast<int64_t>(get_register(rb)));
2709 break;
2710 }
2711 case MTVSRWA: {
2712 DCHECK(!instr->Bit(0));
2713 int frt = instr->RTValue();
2714 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2715 int64_t ra_val = static_cast<int32_t>(get_register(ra));
2716 set_d_register(frt, ra_val);
2717 break;
2718 }
2719 case MTVSRWZ: {
2720 DCHECK(!instr->Bit(0));
2721 int frt = instr->RTValue();
2722 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2723 uint64_t ra_val = static_cast<uint32_t>(get_register(ra));
2724 set_d_register(frt, ra_val);
2725 break;
2726 }
2727#endif
2728 case CNTLZWX: {
2729 int rs = instr->RSValue();
2730 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2731 uintptr_t rs_val = get_register(rs);
2732 uintptr_t count = 0;
2733 int n = 0;
2734 uintptr_t bit = 0x80000000;
2735 for (; n < 32; n++) {
2736 if (bit & rs_val) break;
2737 count++;
2738 bit >>= 1;
2739 }
2740 set_register(ra, count);
2741 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC Bit set
2742 int bf = 0;
2743 if (count > 0) {
2744 bf |= 0x40000000;
2745 }
2746 if (count == 0) {
2747 bf |= 0x20000000;
2748 }
2749 condition_reg_ = (condition_reg_ & ~0xF0000000) | bf;
2750 }
2751 break;
2752 }
2753 case CNTLZDX: {
2754 int rs = instr->RSValue();
2755 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2756 uintptr_t rs_val = get_register(rs);
2757 uintptr_t count = 0;
2758 int n = 0;
2759 uintptr_t bit = 0x8000000000000000UL;
2760 for (; n < 64; n++) {
2761 if (bit & rs_val) break;
2762 count++;
2763 bit >>= 1;
2764 }
2765 set_register(ra, count);
2766 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC Bit set
2767 int bf = 0;
2768 if (count > 0) {
2769 bf |= 0x40000000;
2770 }
2771 if (count == 0) {
2772 bf |= 0x20000000;
2773 }
2774 condition_reg_ = (condition_reg_ & ~0xF0000000) | bf;
2775 }
2776 break;
2777 }
2778 case CNTTZWX: {
2779 int rs = instr->RSValue();
2780 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2781 uint32_t rs_val = static_cast<uint32_t>(get_register(rs));
2782 uintptr_t count = rs_val == 0 ? 32 : __builtin_ctz(rs_val);
2783 set_register(ra, count);
2784 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC Bit set
2785 int bf = 0;
2786 if (count > 0) {
2787 bf |= 0x40000000;
2788 }
2789 if (count == 0) {
2790 bf |= 0x20000000;
2791 }
2792 condition_reg_ = (condition_reg_ & ~0xF0000000) | bf;
2793 }
2794 break;
2795 }
2796 case CNTTZDX: {
2797 int rs = instr->RSValue();
2798 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2799 uint64_t rs_val = get_register(rs);
2800 uintptr_t count = rs_val == 0 ? 64 : __builtin_ctzl(rs_val);
2801 set_register(ra, count);
2802 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC Bit set
2803 int bf = 0;
2804 if (count > 0) {
2805 bf |= 0x40000000;
2806 }
2807 if (count == 0) {
2808 bf |= 0x20000000;
2809 }
2810 condition_reg_ = (condition_reg_ & ~0xF0000000) | bf;
2811 }
2812 break;
2813 }
2814 case ANDX: {
2815 int rs = instr->RSValue();
2816 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2817 int rb = instr->RBValue();
2818 intptr_t rs_val = get_register(rs);
2819 intptr_t rb_val = get_register(rb);
2820 intptr_t alu_out = rs_val & rb_val;
2821 set_register(ra, alu_out);
2822 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC Bit set
2823 SetCR0(alu_out);
2824 }
2825 break;
2826 }
2827 case ANDCX: {
2828 int rs = instr->RSValue();
2829 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2830 int rb = instr->RBValue();
2831 intptr_t rs_val = get_register(rs);
2832 intptr_t rb_val = get_register(rb);
2833 intptr_t alu_out = rs_val & ~rb_val;
2834 set_register(ra, alu_out);
2835 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC Bit set
2836 SetCR0(alu_out);
2837 }
2838 break;
2839 }
2840 case CMPL: {
2841 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2842 int rb = instr->RBValue();
2843 int cr = instr->Bits(25, 23);
2844 uint32_t bf = 0;
2845#if V8_TARGET_ARCH_PPC64
2846 int L = instr->Bit(21);
2847 if (L) {
2848#endif
2849 uintptr_t ra_val = get_register(ra);
2850 uintptr_t rb_val = get_register(rb);
2851 if (ra_val < rb_val) {
2852 bf |= 0x80000000;
2853 }
2854 if (ra_val > rb_val) {
2855 bf |= 0x40000000;
2856 }
2857 if (ra_val == rb_val) {
2858 bf |= 0x20000000;
2859 }
2860#if V8_TARGET_ARCH_PPC64
2861 } else {
2862 uint32_t ra_val = get_register(ra);
2863 uint32_t rb_val = get_register(rb);
2864 if (ra_val < rb_val) {
2865 bf |= 0x80000000;
2866 }
2867 if (ra_val > rb_val) {
2868 bf |= 0x40000000;
2869 }
2870 if (ra_val == rb_val) {
2871 bf |= 0x20000000;
2872 }
2873 }
2874#endif
2875 uint32_t condition_mask = 0xF0000000U >> (cr * 4);
2876 uint32_t condition = bf >> (cr * 4);
2877 condition_reg_ = (condition_reg_ & ~condition_mask) | condition;
2878 break;
2879 }
2880 case SUBFX: {
2881 int rt = instr->RTValue();
2882 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2883 int rb = instr->RBValue();
2884 // int oe = instr->Bit(10);
2885 intptr_t ra_val = get_register(ra);
2886 intptr_t rb_val = get_register(rb);
2887 intptr_t alu_out = rb_val - ra_val;
2888 // todo - figure out underflow
2889 set_register(rt, alu_out);
2890 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC Bit set
2891 SetCR0(alu_out);
2892 }
2893 // todo - handle OE bit
2894 break;
2895 }
2896 case ADDZEX: {
2897 int rt = instr->RTValue();
2898 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2899 intptr_t ra_val = get_register(ra);
2900 if (special_reg_xer_ & 0x20000000) {
2901 ra_val += 1;
2902 }
2903 set_register(rt, ra_val);
2904 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
2905 SetCR0(ra_val);
2906 }
2907 // todo - handle OE bit
2908 break;
2909 }
2910 case NORX: {
2911 int rs = instr->RSValue();
2912 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2913 int rb = instr->RBValue();
2914 intptr_t rs_val = get_register(rs);
2915 intptr_t rb_val = get_register(rb);
2916 intptr_t alu_out = ~(rs_val | rb_val);
2917 set_register(ra, alu_out);
2918 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
2919 SetCR0(alu_out);
2920 }
2921 break;
2922 }
2923 case MULLW: {
2924 int rt = instr->RTValue();
2925 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2926 int rb = instr->RBValue();
2927 int32_t ra_val = (get_register(ra) & 0xFFFFFFFF);
2928 int32_t rb_val = (get_register(rb) & 0xFFFFFFFF);
2929 int32_t alu_out = ra_val * rb_val;
2930 set_register(rt, alu_out);
2931 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
2932 SetCR0(alu_out);
2933 }
2934 // todo - handle OE bit
2935 break;
2936 }
2937#if V8_TARGET_ARCH_PPC64
2938 case MULLD: {
2939 int rt = instr->RTValue();
2940 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2941 int rb = instr->RBValue();
2942 int64_t ra_val = get_register(ra);
2943 int64_t rb_val = get_register(rb);
2944 int64_t alu_out = ra_val * rb_val;
2945 set_register(rt, alu_out);
2946 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
2947 SetCR0(alu_out);
2948 }
2949 // todo - handle OE bit
2950 break;
2951 }
2952#endif
2953 case DIVW: {
2954 int rt = instr->RTValue();
2955 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2956 int rb = instr->RBValue();
2957 int32_t ra_val = get_register(ra);
2958 int32_t rb_val = get_register(rb);
2959 bool overflow = (ra_val == kMinInt && rb_val == -1);
2960 // result is undefined if divisor is zero or if operation
2961 // is 0x80000000 / -1.
2962 int32_t alu_out = (rb_val == 0 || overflow) ? -1 : ra_val / rb_val;
2963 set_register(rt, alu_out);
2964 if (instr->Bit(10)) { // OE bit set
2965 if (overflow) {
2966 special_reg_xer_ |= 0xC0000000; // set SO,OV
2967 } else {
2968 special_reg_xer_ &= ~0x40000000; // clear OV
2969 }
2970 }
2971 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
2972 bool setSO = (special_reg_xer_ & 0x80000000);
2973 SetCR0(alu_out, setSO);
2974 }
2975 break;
2976 }
2977 case DIVWU: {
2978 int rt = instr->RTValue();
2979 int ra = instr->RAValue();
2980 int rb = instr->RBValue();
2981 uint32_t ra_val = get_register(ra);
2982 uint32_t rb_val = get_register(rb);
2983 bool overflow = (rb_val == 0);
2984 // result is undefined if divisor is zero
2985 uint32_t alu_out = (overflow) ? -1 : ra_val / rb_val;
2986 set_register(rt, alu_out);
2987 if (instr->Bit(10)) { // OE bit set
2988 if (overflow) {
2989 special_reg_xer_ |= 0xC0000000; // set SO,OV
2990 } else {
2991 special_reg_xer_ &= ~0x40000000; // clear OV
2992 }
2993 }
2994 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
2995 bool setSO = (special_reg_xer_ & 0x80000000);
2996 SetCR0(alu_out, setSO);
2997 }
2998 break;
2999 }
3000#if V8_TARGET_ARCH_PPC64
3001 case DIVD: {
3002 int rt = instr->RTValue();
3003 int ra = instr->RAValue();
3004 int rb = instr->RBValue();
3005 int64_t ra_val = get_register(ra);
3006 int64_t rb_val = get_register(rb);
3007 int64_t one = 1; // work-around gcc
3008 int64_t kMinLongLong = (one << 63);
3009 // result is undefined if divisor is zero or if operation
3010 // is 0x80000000_00000000 / -1.
3011 int64_t alu_out =
3012 (rb_val == 0 || (ra_val == kMinLongLong && rb_val == -1))
3013 ? -1
3014 : ra_val / rb_val;
3015 set_register(rt, alu_out);
3016 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
3017 SetCR0(alu_out);
3018 }
3019 // todo - handle OE bit
3020 break;
3021 }
3022 case DIVDU: {
3023 int rt = instr->RTValue();
3024 int ra = instr->RAValue();
3025 int rb = instr->RBValue();
3026 uint64_t ra_val = get_register(ra);
3027 uint64_t rb_val = get_register(rb);
3028 // result is undefined if divisor is zero
3029 uint64_t alu_out = (rb_val == 0) ? -1 : ra_val / rb_val;
3030 set_register(rt, alu_out);
3031 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
3032 SetCR0(alu_out);
3033 }
3034 // todo - handle OE bit
3035 break;
3036 }
3037#endif
3038 case ADDX: {
3039 int rt = instr->RTValue();
3040 int ra = instr->RAValue();
3041 int rb = instr->RBValue();
3042 // int oe = instr->Bit(10);
3043 intptr_t ra_val = get_register(ra);
3044 intptr_t rb_val = get_register(rb);
3045 intptr_t alu_out = ra_val + rb_val;
3046 set_register(rt, alu_out);
3047 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
3048 SetCR0(alu_out);
3049 }
3050 // todo - handle OE bit
3051 break;
3052 }
3053 case XORX: {
3054 int rs = instr->RSValue();
3055 int ra = instr->RAValue();
3056 int rb = instr->RBValue();
3057 intptr_t rs_val = get_register(rs);
3058 intptr_t rb_val = get_register(rb);
3059 intptr_t alu_out = rs_val ^ rb_val;
3060 set_register(ra, alu_out);
3061 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
3062 SetCR0(alu_out);
3063 }
3064 break;
3065 }
3066 case ORX: {
3067 int rs = instr->RSValue();
3068 int ra = instr->RAValue();
3069 int rb = instr->RBValue();
3070 intptr_t rs_val = get_register(rs);
3071 intptr_t rb_val = get_register(rb);
3072 intptr_t alu_out = rs_val | rb_val;
3073 set_register(ra, alu_out);
3074 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
3075 SetCR0(alu_out);
3076 }
3077 break;
3078 }
3079 case ORC: {
3080 int rs = instr->RSValue();
3081 int ra = instr->RAValue();
3082 int rb = instr->RBValue();
3083 intptr_t rs_val = get_register(rs);
3084 intptr_t rb_val = get_register(rb);
3085 intptr_t alu_out = rs_val | ~rb_val;
3086 set_register(ra, alu_out);
3087 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
3088 SetCR0(alu_out);
3089 }
3090 break;
3091 }
3092 case MFSPR: {
3093 int rt = instr->RTValue();
3094 int spr = instr->Bits(20, 11);
3095 if (spr != 256) {
3096 UNIMPLEMENTED(); // Only LRLR supported
3097 }
3098 set_register(rt, special_reg_lr_);
3099 break;
3100 }
3101 case MTSPR: {
3102 int rt = instr->RTValue();
3103 intptr_t rt_val = get_register(rt);
3104 int spr = instr->Bits(20, 11);
3105 if (spr == 256) {
3106 special_reg_lr_ = rt_val;
3107 } else if (spr == 288) {
3108 special_reg_ctr_ = rt_val;
3109 } else if (spr == 32) {
3110 special_reg_xer_ = rt_val;
3111 } else {
3112 UNIMPLEMENTED(); // Only LR supported
3113 }
3114 break;
3115 }
3116 case MFCR: {
3117 int rt = instr->RTValue();
3118 set_register(rt, condition_reg_);
3119 break;
3120 }
3121 case STWUX:
3122 case STWX: {
3123 int rs = instr->RSValue();
3124 int ra = instr->RAValue();
3125 int rb = instr->RBValue();
3126 intptr_t ra_val = ra == 0 ? 0 : get_register(ra);
3127 int32_t rs_val = get_register(rs);
3128 intptr_t rb_val = get_register(rb);
3129 WriteW(ra_val + rb_val, rs_val);
3130 if (opcode == STWUX) {
3131 DCHECK_NE(ra, 0);
3132 set_register(ra, ra_val + rb_val);
3133 }
3134 break;
3135 }
3136 case STBUX:
3137 case STBX: {
3138 int rs = instr->RSValue();
3139 int ra = instr->RAValue();
3140 int rb = instr->RBValue();
3141 intptr_t ra_val = ra == 0 ? 0 : get_register(ra);
3142 int8_t rs_val = get_register(rs);
3143 intptr_t rb_val = get_register(rb);
3144 WriteB(ra_val + rb_val, rs_val);
3145 if (opcode == STBUX) {
3146 DCHECK_NE(ra, 0);
3147 set_register(ra, ra_val + rb_val);
3148 }
3149 break;
3150 }

3348 case ISEL: {
3349 int rt = instr->RTValue();
3350 int ra = instr->RAValue();
3351 int rb = instr->RBValue();
3352 int condition_bit = instr->RCValue();
3353 int condition_mask = 0x80000000 >> condition_bit;
3354 intptr_t ra_val = (ra == 0) ? 0 : get_register(ra);
3355 intptr_t rb_val = get_register(rb);
3356 intptr_t value = (condition_reg_ & condition_mask) ? ra_val : rb_val;
3357 set_register(rt, value);
3358 break;
3359 }
3360
3361 case STBU:
3362 case STB: {
3363 int ra = instr->RAValue();
3364 int rs = instr->RSValue();
3365 intptr_t ra_val = ra == 0 ? 0 : get_register(ra);
3366 int8_t rs_val = get_register(rs);
3367 int offset = SIGN_EXT_IMM16(instr->Bits(15, 0));
3368 WriteB(ra_val + offset, rs_val);
3369 if (opcode == STBU) {
3370 DCHECK_NE(ra, 0);
3371 set_register(ra, ra_val + offset);
3372 }
3373 break;
3374 }

3381 int offset = SIGN_EXT_IMM16(instr->Bits(15, 0));
3382 uintptr_t result = ReadHU(ra_val + offset) & 0xFFFF;
3383 set_register(rt, result);
3384 if (opcode == LHZU) {
3385 set_register(ra, ra_val + offset);
3386 }
3387 break;
3388 }

3398 if (opcode == LHAU) {

3400 }

3406 int ra = instr->RAValue();

3419 case LMW:

3423
3424 case LFSU:
3425 case LFS: {
3426 int frt = instr->RTValue();
3427 int ra = instr->RAValue();
3428 int32_t offset = SIGN_EXT_IMM16(instr->Bits(15, 0));
3429 intptr_t ra_val = ra == 0 ? 0 : get_register(ra);
3430 int32_t val = ReadW(ra_val + offset);
3431 float* fptr = reinterpret_cast<float*>(&val);
3432#if V8_HOST_ARCH_IA32 || V8_HOST_ARCH_X64
3433 // Conversion using double changes sNan to qNan on ia32/x64
3434 if ((val & 0x7F800000) == 0x7F800000) {
3435 int64_t dval = static_cast<int64_t>(val);
3436 dval = ((dval & 0xC0000000) << 32) | ((dval & 0x40000000) << 31) |
3437 ((dval & 0x40000000) << 30) | ((dval & 0x7FFFFFFF) << 29) | 0x0;
3438 set_d_register(frt, dval);
3439 } else {
3440 set_d_register_from_double(frt, static_cast<double>(*fptr));
3441 }
3442#else
3443 set_d_register_from_double(frt, static_cast<double>(*fptr));
3444#endif
3445 if (opcode == LFSU) {
3446 DCHECK_NE(ra, 0);
3447 set_register(ra, ra_val + offset);
3448 }
3449 break;
3450 }
3451
3452 case LFDU:
3453 case LFD: {
3454 int frt = instr->RTValue();
3455 int ra = instr->RAValue();
3456 int32_t offset = SIGN_EXT_IMM16(instr->Bits(15, 0));
3457 intptr_t ra_val = ra == 0 ? 0 : get_register(ra);
3458 int64_t dptr = ReadDW(ra_val + offset);
3459 set_d_register(frt, dptr);
3460 if (opcode == LFDU) {
3461 DCHECK_NE(ra, 0);
3462 set_register(ra, ra_val + offset);
3463 }
3464 break;
3465 }
3466
3467 case STFSU:
3468 [[fallthrough]];
3469 case STFS: {
3470 int frs = instr->RSValue();
3471 int ra = instr->RAValue();
3472 int32_t offset = SIGN_EXT_IMM16(instr->Bits(15, 0));
3473 intptr_t ra_val = ra == 0 ? 0 : get_register(ra);
3474 float frs_val = static_cast<float>(get_double_from_d_register(frs));
3475 int32_t* p;
3476#if V8_HOST_ARCH_IA32 || V8_HOST_ARCH_X64
3477 // Conversion using double changes sNan to qNan on ia32/x64
3478 int32_t sval = 0;
3479 int64_t dval = get_d_register(frs);
3480 if ((dval & 0x7FF0000000000000) == 0x7FF0000000000000) {
3481 sval = ((dval & 0xC000000000000000) >> 32) |
3482 ((dval & 0x07FFFFFFE0000000) >> 29);
3483 p = &sval;
3484 } else {
3485 p = reinterpret_cast<int32_t*>(&frs_val);
3486 }
3487#else
3488 p = reinterpret_cast<int32_t*>(&frs_val);
3489#endif
3490 WriteW(ra_val + offset, *p);
3491 if (opcode == STFSU) {
3492 DCHECK_NE(ra, 0);
3493 set_register(ra, ra_val + offset);
3494 }
3495 break;
3496 }
3497 case STFDU:
3498 case STFD: {
3499 int frs = instr->RSValue();
3500 int ra = instr->RAValue();
3501 int32_t offset = SIGN_EXT_IMM16(instr->Bits(15, 0));
3502 intptr_t ra_val = ra == 0 ? 0 : get_register(ra);
3503 int64_t frs_val = get_d_register(frs);
3504 WriteDW(ra_val + offset, frs_val);
3505 if (opcode == STFDU) {
3506 DCHECK_NE(ra, 0);
3507 set_register(ra, ra_val + offset);
3508 }
3509 break;
3510 }
3511 case BRW: {
3512 constexpr int kBitsPerWord = 32;
3513 int rs = instr->RSValue();
3514 int ra = instr->RAValue();
3515 uint64_t rs_val = get_register(rs);
3516 uint32_t rs_high = rs_val >> kBitsPerWord;
3517 uint32_t rs_low = (rs_val << kBitsPerWord) >> kBitsPerWord;
3518 uint64_t result = ByteReverse<int32_t>(rs_high);
3519 result = (result << kBitsPerWord) | ByteReverse<int32_t>(rs_low);
3520 set_register(ra, result);
3521 break;
3522 }
3523 case BRD: {
3524 int rs = instr->RSValue();
3525 int ra = instr->RAValue();
3526 uint64_t rs_val = get_register(rs);
3527 set_register(ra, ByteReverse<int64_t>(rs_val));
3528 break;
3529 }
3530 case FCFIDS: {
3531 // fcfids
3532 int frt = instr->RTValue();
3533 int frb = instr->RBValue();
3534 int64_t frb_val = get_d_register(frb);
3535 double frt_val = static_cast<float>(frb_val);
3536 set_d_register_from_double(frt, frt_val);
3537 return;
3538 }

3544 double frt_val = static_cast<float>(frb_val);
3545 set_d_register_from_double(frt, frt_val);

3547 }
3548
3549 case FDIV: {

3554 double frb_val = get_double_from_d_register(frb);
3555 double frt_val = fra_val / frb_val;
3556 set_d_register_from_double(frt, frt_val);
3557 return;
3558 }

3566 set_d_register_from_double(frt, frt_val);

3568 }
3569 case FADD: {
3570 int frt = instr->RTValue();

3575 double frt_val = fra_val + frb_val;
3576 set_d_register_from_double(frt, frt_val);

3578 }
3579 case FSQRT: {
3580 int frt = instr->RTValue();
3581 int frb = instr->RBValue();
3582 double frb_val = get_double_from_d_register(frb);
3583 double frt_val = std::sqrt(frb_val);
3584 set_d_register_from_double(frt, frt_val);
3585 return;
3586 }
3587 case FSEL: {
3588 int frt = instr->RTValue();
3589 int fra = instr->RAValue();
3590 int frb = instr->RBValue();
3591 int frc = instr->RCValue();
3592 double fra_val = get_double_from_d_register(fra);
3593 double frb_val = get_double_from_d_register(frb);
3594 double frc_val = get_double_from_d_register(frc);
3595 double frt_val = ((fra_val >= 0.0) ? frc_val : frb_val);
3596 set_d_register_from_double(frt, frt_val);
3597 return;
3598 }
3599 case FMUL: {
3600 int frt = instr->RTValue();
3601 int fra = instr->RAValue();
3602 int frc = instr->RCValue();
3603 double fra_val = get_double_from_d_register(fra);
3604 double frc_val = get_double_from_d_register(frc);
3605 double frt_val = fra_val * frc_val;
3606 set_d_register_from_double(frt, frt_val);
3607 return;
3608 }
3609 case FMSUB: {
3610 int frt = instr->RTValue();
3611 int fra = instr->RAValue();
3612 int frb = instr->RBValue();
3613 int frc = instr->RCValue();
3614 double fra_val = get_double_from_d_register(fra);
3615 double frb_val = get_double_from_d_register(frb);
3616 double frc_val = get_double_from_d_register(frc);
3617 double frt_val = (fra_val * frc_val) - frb_val;
3618 set_d_register_from_double(frt, frt_val);
3619 return;
3620 }
3621 case FMADD: {
3622 int frt = instr->RTValue();
3623 int fra = instr->RAValue();
3624 int frb = instr->RBValue();
3625 int frc = instr->RCValue();
3626 double fra_val = get_double_from_d_register(fra);
3627 double frb_val = get_double_from_d_register(frb);
3628 double frc_val = get_double_from_d_register(frc);
3629 double frt_val = (fra_val * frc_val) + frb_val;
3630 set_d_register_from_double(frt, frt_val);
3631 return;
3632 }
3633 case FCMPU: {
3634 int fra = instr->RAValue();
3635 int frb = instr->RBValue();
3636 double fra_val = get_double_from_d_register(fra);
3637 double frb_val = get_double_from_d_register(frb);
3638 int cr = instr->Bits(25, 23);
3639 int bf = 0;
3640 if (fra_val < frb_val) {
3641 bf |= 0x80000000;
3642 }
3643 if (fra_val > frb_val) {
3644 bf |= 0x40000000;
3645 }
3646 if (fra_val == frb_val) {
3647 bf |= 0x20000000;
3648 }
3649 if (std::isunordered(fra_val, frb_val)) {
3650 bf |= 0x10000000;
3651 }
3652 int condition_mask = 0xF0000000 >> (cr * 4);
3653 int condition = bf >> (cr * 4);
3654 condition_reg_ = (condition_reg_ & ~condition_mask) | condition;
3655 return;
3656 }
3657 case FRIN: {
3658 int frt = instr->RTValue();
3659 int frb = instr->RBValue();
3660 double frb_val = get_double_from_d_register(frb);
3661 double frt_val = std::round(frb_val);
3662 set_d_register_from_double(frt, frt_val);
3663 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
3664 // UNIMPLEMENTED();
3665 }
3666 return;
3667 }
3668 case FRIZ: {
3669 int frt = instr->RTValue();
3670 int frb = instr->RBValue();
3671 double frb_val = get_double_from_d_register(frb);
3672 double frt_val = std::trunc(frb_val);
3673 set_d_register_from_double(frt, frt_val);
3674 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
3675 // UNIMPLEMENTED();
3676 }
3677 return;
3678 }
3679 case FRIP: {
3680 int frt = instr->RTValue();
3681 int frb = instr->RBValue();
3682 double frb_val = get_double_from_d_register(frb);
3683 double frt_val = std::ceil(frb_val);
3684 set_d_register_from_double(frt, frt_val);
3685 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
3686 // UNIMPLEMENTED();
3687 }
3688 return;
3689 }
3690 case FRIM: {
3691 int frt = instr->RTValue();
3692 int frb = instr->RBValue();
3693 double frb_val = get_double_from_d_register(frb);
3694 double frt_val = std::floor(frb_val);
3695 set_d_register_from_double(frt, frt_val);
3696 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
3697 // UNIMPLEMENTED();
3698 }
3699 return;
3700 }
3701 case FRSP: {
3702 int frt = instr->RTValue();
3703 int frb = instr->RBValue();
3704 // frsp round 8-byte double-precision value to
3705 // single-precision value
3706 double frb_val = get_double_from_d_register(frb);
3707 double frt_val = static_cast<float>(frb_val);
3708 set_d_register_from_double(frt, frt_val);
3709 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
3710 // UNIMPLEMENTED();
3711 }
3712 return;
3713 }
3714 case FCFID: {
3715 int frt = instr->RTValue();
3716 int frb = instr->RBValue();
3717 int64_t frb_val = get_d_register(frb);
3718 double frt_val = static_cast<double>(frb_val);
3719 set_d_register_from_double(frt, frt_val);
3720 return;
3721 }
3722 case FCFIDU: {
3723 int frt = instr->RTValue();
3724 int frb = instr->RBValue();
3725 uint64_t frb_val = get_d_register(frb);
3726 double frt_val = static_cast<double>(frb_val);
3727 set_d_register_from_double(frt, frt_val);
3728 return;
3729 }
3730 case FCTID:
3731 case FCTIDZ: {
3732 int frt = instr->RTValue();
3733 int frb = instr->RBValue();
3734 double frb_val = get_double_from_d_register(frb);
3735 int mode = (opcode == FCTIDZ) ? kRoundToZero
3736 : (fp_condition_reg_ & kFPRoundingModeMask);
3737 int64_t frt_val;
3738 int64_t one = 1; // work-around gcc
3739 int64_t kMinVal = (one << 63);
3740 int64_t kMaxVal = kMinVal - 1;
3741 bool invalid_convert = false;
3742
3743 if (std::isnan(frb_val)) {
3744 frt_val = kMinVal;
3745 invalid_convert = true;
3746 } else {
3747 switch (mode) {
3748 case kRoundToZero:
3749 frb_val = std::trunc(frb_val);
3750 break;
3751 case kRoundToPlusInf:
3752 frb_val = std::ceil(frb_val);
3753 break;
3754 case kRoundToMinusInf:
3755 frb_val = std::floor(frb_val);
3756 break;
3757 default:
3758 UNIMPLEMENTED(); // Not used by V8.
3759 }
3760 if (frb_val < static_cast<double>(kMinVal)) {
3761 frt_val = kMinVal;
3762 invalid_convert = true;
3763 } else if (frb_val >= static_cast<double>(kMaxVal)) {
3764 frt_val = kMaxVal;
3765 invalid_convert = true;
3766 } else {
3767 frt_val = (int64_t)frb_val;
3768 }
3769 }
3770 set_d_register(frt, frt_val);
3771 if (invalid_convert) SetFPSCR(VXCVI);
3772 return;
3773 }
3774 case FCTIDU:
3775 case FCTIDUZ: {
3776 int frt = instr->RTValue();
3777 int frb = instr->RBValue();
3778 double frb_val = get_double_from_d_register(frb);
3779 int mode = (opcode == FCTIDUZ)
3780 ? kRoundToZero
3781 : (fp_condition_reg_ & kFPRoundingModeMask);
3782 uint64_t frt_val;
3783 uint64_t kMinVal = 0;
3784 uint64_t kMaxVal = kMinVal - 1;
3785 bool invalid_convert = false;
3786
3787 if (std::isnan(frb_val)) {
3788 frt_val = kMinVal;
3789 invalid_convert = true;
3790 } else {
3791 switch (mode) {
3792 case kRoundToZero:
3793 frb_val = std::trunc(frb_val);
3794 break;
3795 case kRoundToPlusInf:
3796 frb_val = std::ceil(frb_val);
3797 break;
3798 case kRoundToMinusInf:
3799 frb_val = std::floor(frb_val);
3800 break;
3801 default:
3802 UNIMPLEMENTED(); // Not used by V8.
3803 }
3804 if (frb_val < static_cast<double>(kMinVal)) {
3805 frt_val = kMinVal;
3806 invalid_convert = true;
3807 } else if (frb_val >= static_cast<double>(kMaxVal)) {
3808 frt_val = kMaxVal;
3809 invalid_convert = true;
3810 } else {
3811 frt_val = (uint64_t)frb_val;
3812 }
3813 }
3814 set_d_register(frt, frt_val);
3815 if (invalid_convert) SetFPSCR(VXCVI);
3816 return;
3817 }
3818 case FCTIW:
3819 case FCTIWZ: {
3820 int frt = instr->RTValue();
3821 int frb = instr->RBValue();
3822 double frb_val = get_double_from_d_register(frb);
3823 int mode = (opcode == FCTIWZ) ? kRoundToZero
3824 : (fp_condition_reg_ & kFPRoundingModeMask);
3825 int64_t frt_val;
3826 int64_t kMinVal = kMinInt;
3827 int64_t kMaxVal = kMaxInt;
3828 bool invalid_convert = false;
3829
3830 if (std::isnan(frb_val)) {
3831 frt_val = kMinVal;
3832 } else {
3833 switch (mode) {
3834 case kRoundToZero:
3835 frb_val = std::trunc(frb_val);
3836 break;
3837 case kRoundToPlusInf:
3838 frb_val = std::ceil(frb_val);
3839 break;
3840 case kRoundToMinusInf:
3841 frb_val = std::floor(frb_val);
3842 break;
3843 case kRoundToNearest: {
3844 double orig = frb_val;
3845 frb_val = lround(frb_val);
3846 // Round to even if exactly halfway. (lround rounds up)
3847 if (std::fabs(frb_val - orig) == 0.5 && ((int64_t)frb_val % 2)) {
3848 frb_val += ((frb_val > 0) ? -1.0 : 1.0);
3849 }
3850 break;
3851 }
3852 default:
3853 UNIMPLEMENTED(); // Not used by V8.
3854 }
3855 if (frb_val < kMinVal) {
3856 frt_val = kMinVal;
3857 invalid_convert = true;
3858 } else if (frb_val > kMaxVal) {
3859 frt_val = kMaxVal;
3860 invalid_convert = true;
3861 } else {
3862 frt_val = (int64_t)frb_val;
3863 }
3864 }
3865 set_d_register(frt, frt_val);
3866 if (invalid_convert) SetFPSCR(VXCVI);
3867 return;
3868 }
3869 case FCTIWU:
3870 case FCTIWUZ: {
3871 int frt = instr->RTValue();
3872 int frb = instr->RBValue();
3873 double frb_val = get_double_from_d_register(frb);
3874 int mode = (opcode == FCTIWUZ)
3875 ? kRoundToZero
3876 : (fp_condition_reg_ & kFPRoundingModeMask);
3877 uint64_t frt_val;
3878 uint64_t kMinVal = kMinUInt32;
3879 uint64_t kMaxVal = kMaxUInt32;
3880 bool invalid_convert = false;
3881
3882 if (std::isnan(frb_val)) {
3883 frt_val = kMinVal;
3884 } else {
3885 switch (mode) {
3886 case kRoundToZero:
3887 frb_val = std::trunc(frb_val);
3888 break;
3889 case kRoundToPlusInf:
3890 frb_val = std::ceil(frb_val);
3891 break;
3892 case kRoundToMinusInf:
3893 frb_val = std::floor(frb_val);
3894 break;
3895 default:
3896 UNIMPLEMENTED(); // Not used by V8.
3897 }
3898 if (frb_val < kMinVal) {
3899 frt_val = kMinVal;
3900 invalid_convert = true;
3901 } else if (frb_val > kMaxVal) {
3902 frt_val = kMaxVal;
3903 invalid_convert = true;
3904 } else {
3905 frt_val = (uint64_t)frb_val;
3906 }
3907 }
3908 set_d_register(frt, frt_val);
3909 if (invalid_convert) SetFPSCR(VXCVI);
3910 return;
3911 }
3912 case FNEG: {
3913 int frt = instr->RTValue();
3914 int frb = instr->RBValue();
3915 double frb_val = get_double_from_d_register(frb);
3916 double frt_val = -frb_val;
3917 set_d_register_from_double(frt, frt_val);
3918 return;
3919 }
3920 case FCPSGN: {
3921 int frt = instr->RTValue();
3922 int frb = instr->RBValue();
3923 int fra = instr->RAValue();
3924 double frb_val = get_double_from_d_register(frb);
3925 double fra_val = get_double_from_d_register(fra);
3926 double frt_val = std::copysign(frb_val, fra_val);
3927 set_d_register_from_double(frt, frt_val);
3928 return;
3929 }
3930 case FMR: {
3931 int frt = instr->RTValue();
3932 int frb = instr->RBValue();
3933 int64_t frb_val = get_d_register(frb);
3934 set_d_register(frt, frb_val);
3935 return;
3936 }
3937 case MTFSFI: {
3938 int bf = instr->Bits(25, 23);
3939 int imm = instr->Bits(15, 12);
3940 int fp_condition_mask = 0xF0000000 >> (bf * 4);
3941 fp_condition_reg_ &= ~fp_condition_mask;
3942 fp_condition_reg_ |= (imm << (28 - (bf * 4)));
3943 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
3944 condition_reg_ &= 0xF0FFFFFF;
3945 condition_reg_ |= (imm << 23);
3946 }
3947 return;
3948 }
3949 case MTFSF: {
3950 int frb = instr->RBValue();
3951 int64_t frb_dval = get_d_register(frb);
3952 int32_t frb_ival = static_cast<int32_t>((frb_dval)&0xFFFFFFFF);
3953 int l = instr->Bits(25, 25);
3954 if (l == 1) {
3955 fp_condition_reg_ = frb_ival;
3956 } else {
3957 UNIMPLEMENTED();
3958 }
3959 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
3960 UNIMPLEMENTED();
3961 // int w = instr->Bits(16, 16);
3962 // int flm = instr->Bits(24, 17);
3963 }
3964 return;
3965 }
3966 case MFFS: {
3967 int frt = instr->RTValue();
3968 int64_t lval = static_cast<int64_t>(fp_condition_reg_);
3969 set_d_register(frt, lval);
3970 return;
3971 }
3972 case MCRFS: {
3973 int bf = instr->Bits(25, 23);
3974 int bfa = instr->Bits(20, 18);
3975 int cr_shift = (7 - bf) * CRWIDTH;
3976 int fp_shift = (7 - bfa) * CRWIDTH;
3977 int field_val = (fp_condition_reg_ >> fp_shift) & 0xF;
3978 condition_reg_ &= ~(0x0F << cr_shift);
3979 condition_reg_ |= (field_val << cr_shift);
3980 // Clear copied exception bits
3981 switch (bfa) {
3982 case 5:
3983 ClearFPSCR(VXSOFT);
3984 ClearFPSCR(VXSQRT);
3985 ClearFPSCR(VXCVI);
3986 break;
3987 default:
3988 UNIMPLEMENTED();
3989 }
3990 return;
3991 }
3992 case MTFSB0: {
3993 int bt = instr->Bits(25, 21);
3994 ClearFPSCR(bt);
3995 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
3996 UNIMPLEMENTED();
3997 }
3998 return;
3999 }
4000 case MTFSB1: {
4001 int bt = instr->Bits(25, 21);
4002 SetFPSCR(bt);
4003 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
4004 UNIMPLEMENTED();
4005 }
4006 return;
4007 }
4008 case FABS: {
4009 int frt = instr->RTValue();
4010 int frb = instr->RBValue();
4011 double frb_val = get_double_from_d_register(frb);
4012 double frt_val = std::fabs(frb_val);
4013 set_d_register_from_double(frt, frt_val);
4014 return;
4015 }
4016
4017#if V8_TARGET_ARCH_PPC64
4018 case RLDICL: {
4019 int ra = instr->RAValue();
4020 int rs = instr->RSValue();
4021 uintptr_t rs_val = get_register(rs);
4022 int sh = (instr->Bits(15, 11) | (instr->Bit(1) << 5));
4023 int mb = (instr->Bits(10, 6) | (instr->Bit(5) << 5));
4024 DCHECK(sh >= 0 && sh <= 63);
4025 DCHECK(mb >= 0 && mb <= 63);
4026 uintptr_t result = base::bits::RotateLeft64(rs_val, sh);
4027 uintptr_t mask = 0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF >> mb;
4028 result &= mask;
4029 set_register(ra, result);
4030 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
4031 SetCR0(result);
4032 }
4033 return;
4034 }
4035 case RLDICR: {
4036 int ra = instr->RAValue();
4037 int rs = instr->RSValue();
4038 uintptr_t rs_val = get_register(rs);
4039 int sh = (instr->Bits(15, 11) | (instr->Bit(1) << 5));
4040 int me = (instr->Bits(10, 6) | (instr->Bit(5) << 5));
4041 DCHECK(sh >= 0 && sh <= 63);
4042 DCHECK(me >= 0 && me <= 63);
4043 uintptr_t result = base::bits::RotateLeft64(rs_val, sh);
4044 uintptr_t mask = 0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF << (63 - me);
4045 result &= mask;
4046 set_register(ra, result);
4047 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
4048 SetCR0(result);
4049 }
4050 return;
4051 }
4052 case RLDIC: {
4053 int ra = instr->RAValue();
4054 int rs = instr->RSValue();
4055 uintptr_t rs_val = get_register(rs);
4056 int sh = (instr->Bits(15, 11) | (instr->Bit(1) << 5));
4057 int mb = (instr->Bits(10, 6) | (instr->Bit(5) << 5));
4058 DCHECK(sh >= 0 && sh <= 63);
4059 DCHECK(mb >= 0 && mb <= 63);
4060 uintptr_t result = base::bits::RotateLeft64(rs_val, sh);
4061 uintptr_t mask = (0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF >> mb) & (0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF << sh);
4062 result &= mask;
4063 set_register(ra, result);
4064 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
4065 SetCR0(result);
4066 }
4067 return;
4068 }
4069 case RLDIMI: {
4070 int ra = instr->RAValue();
4071 int rs = instr->RSValue();
4072 uintptr_t rs_val = get_register(rs);
4073 intptr_t ra_val = get_register(ra);
4074 int sh = (instr->Bits(15, 11) | (instr->Bit(1) << 5));
4075 int mb = (instr->Bits(10, 6) | (instr->Bit(5) << 5));
4076 int me = 63 - sh;
4077 uintptr_t result = base::bits::RotateLeft64(rs_val, sh);
4078 uintptr_t mask = 0;
4079 if (mb < me + 1) {
4080 uintptr_t bit = 0x8000000000000000 >> mb;
4081 for (; mb <= me; mb++) {
4082 mask |= bit;
4083 bit >>= 1;
4084 }
4085 } else if (mb == me + 1) {
4086 mask = 0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF;
4087 } else { // mb > me+1
4088 uintptr_t bit = 0x8000000000000000 >> (me + 1); // needs to be tested
4089 mask = 0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF;
4090 for (; me < mb; me++) {
4091 mask ^= bit;
4092 bit >>= 1;
4093 }
4094 }
4095 result &= mask;
4096 ra_val &= ~mask;
4097 result |= ra_val;
4098 set_register(ra, result);
4099 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
4100 SetCR0(result);
4101 }
4102 return;
4103 }
4104 case RLDCL: {
4105 int ra = instr->RAValue();
4106 int rs = instr->RSValue();
4107 int rb = instr->RBValue();
4108 uintptr_t rs_val = get_register(rs);
4109 uintptr_t rb_val = get_register(rb);
4110 int sh = (rb_val & 0x3F);
4111 int mb = (instr->Bits(10, 6) | (instr->Bit(5) << 5));
4112 DCHECK(sh >= 0 && sh <= 63);
4113 DCHECK(mb >= 0 && mb <= 63);
4114 uintptr_t result = base::bits::RotateLeft64(rs_val, sh);
4115 uintptr_t mask = 0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF >> mb;
4116 result &= mask;
4117 set_register(ra, result);
4118 if (instr->Bit(0)) { // RC bit set
4119 SetCR0(result);
4120 }
4121 return;
4122 }
4123
4124 case LD:
4125 case LDU:
4126 case LWA: {
4127 int ra = instr->RAValue();
4128 int rt = instr->RTValue();
4129 int64_t ra_val = ra == 0 ? 0 : get_register(ra);
4130 int offset = SIGN_EXT_IMM16(instr->Bits(15, 0) & ~3);
4131 switch (instr->Bits(1, 0)) {
4132 case 0: { // ld
4133 intptr_t result = ReadDW(ra_val + offset);
4134 set_register(rt, result);
4135 break;
4136 }
4137 case 1: { // ldu
4138 intptr_t result = ReadDW(ra_val + offset);
4139 set_register(rt, result);
4140 DCHECK_NE(ra, 0);
4141 set_register(ra, ra_val + offset);
4142 break;
4143 }
4144 case 2: { // lwa
4145 intptr_t result = ReadW(ra_val + offset);
4146 set_register(rt, result);
4147 break;
4148 }
4149 }
4150 break;
4151 }
4152
4153 case STD:
4154 case STDU: {
4155 int ra = instr->RAValue();
4156 int rs = instr->RSValue();
4157 int64_t ra_val = ra == 0 ? 0 : get_register(ra);
4158 int64_t rs_val = get_register(rs);
4159 int offset = SIGN_EXT_IMM16(instr->Bits(15, 0) & ~3);
4160 WriteDW(ra_val + offset, rs_val);
4161 if (opcode == STDU) {
4162 DCHECK_NE(ra, 0);
4163 set_register(ra, ra_val + offset);
4164 }
4165 break;
4166 }
4167#endif
4168
4169 case XSADDDP: {
4170 int frt = instr->RTValue();
4171 int fra = instr->RAValue();
4172 int frb = instr->RBValue();
4173 double fra_val = get_double_from_d_register(fra);
4174 double frb_val = get_double_from_d_register(frb);
4175 double frt_val = fra_val + frb_val;
4176 set_d_register_from_double(frt, frt_val);
4177 return;
4178 }
4179 case XSSUBDP: {
4180 int frt = instr->RTValue();
4181 int fra = instr->RAValue();
4182 int frb = instr->RBValue();
4183 double fra_val = get_double_from_d_register(fra);
4184 double frb_val = get_double_from_d_register(frb);
4185 double frt_val = fra_val - frb_val;
4186 set_d_register_from_double(frt, frt_val);
4187 return;
4188 }
4189 case XSMULDP: {
4190 int frt = instr->RTValue();
4191 int fra = instr->RAValue();
4192 int frb = instr->RBValue();
4193 double fra_val = get_double_from_d_register(fra);
4194 double frb_val = get_double_from_d_register(frb);
4195 double frt_val = fra_val * frb_val;
4196 set_d_register_from_double(frt, frt_val);
4197 return;
4198 }
4199 case XSDIVDP: {
4200 int frt = instr->RTValue();
4201 int fra = instr->RAValue();
4202 int frb = instr->RBValue();
4203 double fra_val = get_double_from_d_register(fra);
4204 double frb_val = get_double_from_d_register(frb);
4205 double frt_val = fra_val / frb_val;
4206 set_d_register_from_double(frt, frt_val);
4207 return;
4208 }
4209 case MTCRF: {
4210 int rs = instr->RSValue();
4211 uint32_t rs_val = static_cast<int32_t>(get_register(rs));
4212 uint8_t fxm = instr->Bits(19, 12);
4213 uint8_t bit_mask = 0x80;
4214 const int field_bit_count = 4;
4215 const int max_field_index = 7;
4216 uint32_t result = 0;
4217 for (int i = 0; i <= max_field_index; i++) {
4218 result <<= field_bit_count;
4219 uint32_t source = condition_reg_;
4220 if ((bit_mask & fxm) != 0) {
4221 // take it from rs.
4222 source = rs_val;
4223 }
4224 result |= ((source << i * field_bit_count) >> i * field_bit_count) >>
4225 (max_field_index - i) * field_bit_count;
4226 bit_mask >>= 1;
4227 }
4228 condition_reg_ = result;
4229 break;
4230 }
4231 // Vector instructions.
4232 case LVX: {
4233 DECODE_VX_INSTRUCTION(vrt, ra, rb, T)
4234 GET_ADDRESS(ra, rb, ra_val, rb_val)
4235 intptr_t addr = (ra_val + rb_val) & 0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF0;
4236 simdr_t* ptr = reinterpret_cast<simdr_t*>(addr);
4237 set_simd_register(vrt, *ptr);
4238 break;
4239 }
4240 case STVX: {
4241 DECODE_VX_INSTRUCTION(vrs, ra, rb, S)
4242 GET_ADDRESS(ra, rb, ra_val, rb_val)
4243 __int128 vrs_val = base::bit_cast<__int128>(get_simd_register(vrs).int8);
4244 WriteQW((ra_val + rb_val) & 0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF0, vrs_val);
4245 break;
4246 }
4247 case LXVD: {
4248 DECODE_VX_INSTRUCTION(xt, ra, rb, T)
4249 GET_ADDRESS(ra, rb, ra_val, rb_val)
4250 set_simd_register_by_lane<int64_t>(xt, 0, ReadDW(ra_val + rb_val));
4251 set_simd_register_by_lane<int64_t>(
4252 xt, 1, ReadDW(ra_val + rb_val + kSystemPointerSize));
4253 break;
4254 }
4255 case LXVX: {
4256 DECODE_VX_INSTRUCTION(vrt, ra, rb, T)
4257 GET_ADDRESS(ra, rb, ra_val, rb_val)
4258 intptr_t addr = ra_val + rb_val;
4259 simdr_t* ptr = reinterpret_cast<simdr_t*>(addr);
4260 set_simd_register(vrt, *ptr);
4261 break;
4262 }
4263 case STXVD: {
4264 DECODE_VX_INSTRUCTION(xs, ra, rb, S)
4265 GET_ADDRESS(ra, rb, ra_val, rb_val)
4266 WriteDW(ra_val + rb_val, get_simd_register_by_lane<int64_t>(xs, 0));
4267 WriteDW(ra_val + rb_val + kSystemPointerSize,
4268 get_simd_register_by_lane<int64_t>(xs, 1));
4269 break;
4270 }
4271 case STXVX: {
4272 DECODE_VX_INSTRUCTION(vrs, ra, rb, S)
4273 GET_ADDRESS(ra, rb, ra_val, rb_val)
4274 intptr_t addr = ra_val + rb_val;
4275 __int128 vrs_val = base::bit_cast<__int128>(get_simd_register(vrs).int8);
4276 WriteQW(addr, vrs_val);
4277 break;
4278 }
4279 case LXSIBZX: {
4280 DECODE_VX_INSTRUCTION(xt, ra, rb, T)
4281 GET_ADDRESS(ra, rb, ra_val, rb_val)
4282 set_simd_register_by_lane<uint64_t>(xt, 0, ReadBU(ra_val + rb_val));
4283 break;
4284 }
4285 case LXSIHZX: {
4286 DECODE_VX_INSTRUCTION(xt, ra, rb, T)
4287 GET_ADDRESS(ra, rb, ra_val, rb_val)
4288 set_simd_register_by_lane<uint64_t>(xt, 0, ReadHU(ra_val + rb_val));
4289 break;
4290 }
4291 case LXSIWZX: {
4292 DECODE_VX_INSTRUCTION(xt, ra, rb, T)
4293 GET_ADDRESS(ra, rb, ra_val, rb_val)
4294 set_simd_register_by_lane<uint64_t>(xt, 0, ReadWU(ra_val + rb_val));
4295 break;
4296 }
4297 case LXSDX: {
4298 DECODE_VX_INSTRUCTION(xt, ra, rb, T)
4299 GET_ADDRESS(ra, rb, ra_val, rb_val)
4300 set_simd_register_by_lane<int64_t>(xt, 0, ReadDW(ra_val + rb_val));
4301 break;
4302 }
4303 case STXSIBX: {

4305 GET_ADDRESS(ra, rb, ra_val, rb_val)
4306 WriteB(ra_val + rb_val, get_simd_register_by_lane<int8_t>(xs, 7));
4307 break;

4313 break;

4318 WriteW(ra_val + rb_val, get_simd_register_by_lane<int32_t>(xs, 1));

4321 case STXSDX: {
4322 DECODE_VX_INSTRUCTION(xs, ra, rb, S)
4323 GET_ADDRESS(ra, rb, ra_val, rb_val)
4324 WriteDW(ra_val + rb_val, get_simd_register_by_lane<int64_t>(xs, 0));
4325 break;
4326 }
4327 case XXBRQ: {
4328 int t = instr->RTValue();
4329 int b = instr->RBValue();
4330 __int128 xb_val = base::bit_cast<__int128>(get_simd_register(b).int8);
4331 __int128 xb_val_reversed = __builtin_bswap128(xb_val);
4332 simdr_t simdr_xb = base::bit_cast<simdr_t>(xb_val_reversed);
4333 set_simd_register(t, simdr_xb);
4334 break;
4335 }
4336#define VSPLT(type) \
4337 uint8_t uim = instr->Bits(19, 16); \
4338 int vrt = instr->RTValue(); \
4339 int vrb = instr->RBValue(); \
4340 type value = get_simd_register_by_lane<type>(vrb, uim); \
4341 FOR_EACH_LANE(i, type) { set_simd_register_by_lane<type>(vrt, i, value); }
4342 case VSPLTW: {

4344 break;

4358 set_simd_register_by_lane<int8_t>(t, i, imm8);

4360 break;

4418#define VEXTRACT(type, element) \

4423 set_simd_register_by_lane<uint64_t>(vrt, 0, 0); \

4443#define VECTOR_LOGICAL_OP(expr) \
4444 DECODE_VX_INSTRUCTION(t, a, b, T) \
4445 FOR_EACH_LANE(i, int64_t) { \
4446 int64_t a_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<int64_t>(a, i); \
4447 int64_t b_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<int64_t>(b, i); \
4448 set_simd_register_by_lane<int64_t>(t, i, expr); \
4449 }

4551#define VECTOR_MULTIPLY_EVEN_ODD(input_type, result_type, is_odd) \
4552 DECODE_VX_INSTRUCTION(t, a, b, T) \
4553 size_t i = 0, j = 0, k = 0; \
4554 size_t lane_size = sizeof(input_type); \
4555 if (is_odd) { \
4556 i = 1; \
4557 j = lane_size; \
4558 } \
4559 for (; j < kSimd128Size; i += 2, j += lane_size * 2, k++) { \
4560 result_type src0 = \
4561 static_cast<result_type>(get_simd_register_by_lane<input_type>(a, i)); \
4562 result_type src1 = \
4563 static_cast<result_type>(get_simd_register_by_lane<input_type>(b, i)); \
4564 set_simd_register_by_lane<result_type>(t, k, src0 * src1); \
4565 }

4572 break;

4576 break;
4577 }

4580 break;
4581 }

4584 break;

4615#define VECTOR_MERGE(type, is_low_side) \
4616 DECODE_VX_INSTRUCTION(t, a, b, T) \
4617 constexpr size_t index_limit = (kSimd128Size / sizeof(type)) / 2; \
4618 for (size_t i = 0, source_index = is_low_side ? i + index_limit : i; \
4619 i < index_limit; i++, source_index++) { \
4620 set_simd_register_by_lane<type>( \
4621 t, 2 * i, get_simd_register_by_lane<type>(a, source_index)); \
4622 set_simd_register_by_lane<type>( \
4623 t, (2 * i) + 1, get_simd_register_by_lane<type>(b, source_index)); \
4624 }
4625 case VMRGLW: {

4643#define VECTOR_MIN_MAX_OP(type, op) \
4644 DECODE_VX_INSTRUCTION(t, a, b, T) \
4645 FOR_EACH_LANE(i, type) { \
4646 type a_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<type>(a, i); \
4647 type b_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<type>(b, i); \
4648 set_simd_register_by_lane<type>(t, i, a_val op b_val ? a_val : b_val); \
4649 }

4898 case XVCVSPSXWS: {
4899 VectorConverFromFPSaturate<float, int32_t>(this, instr, kMinInt, kMaxInt);
4900 break;
4901 }
4902 case XVCVSPUXWS: {
4903 VectorConverFromFPSaturate<float, uint32_t>(this, instr, 0, kMaxUInt32);
4904 break;
4905 }
4906 case XVCVDPSXWS: {
4907 VectorConverFromFPSaturate<double, int32_t>(this, instr, kMinInt, kMaxInt,
4908 true);
4909 break;
4910 }
4911 case XVCVDPUXWS: {
4912 VectorConverFromFPSaturate<double, uint32_t>(this, instr, 0, kMaxUInt32,
4913 true);
4914 break;
4915 }
4916 case XVCVSXWSP: {
4917 int t = instr->RTValue();
4918 int b = instr->RBValue();
4919 FOR_EACH_LANE(i, int32_t) {
4920 int32_t b_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<int32_t>(b, i);
4921 set_simd_register_by_lane<float>(t, i, static_cast<float>(b_val));
4922 }
4923 break;
4924 }
4925 case XVCVUXWSP: {
4926 int t = instr->RTValue();
4927 int b = instr->RBValue();
4928 FOR_EACH_LANE(i, uint32_t) {
4929 uint32_t b_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<uint32_t>(b, i);
4930 set_simd_register_by_lane<float>(t, i, static_cast<float>(b_val));
4931 }
4932 break;
4933 }
4934 case XVCVSXDDP: {
4935 int t = instr->RTValue();
4936 int b = instr->RBValue();
4937 FOR_EACH_LANE(i, int64_t) {
4938 int64_t b_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<int64_t>(b, i);
4939 set_simd_register_by_lane<double>(t, i, static_cast<double>(b_val));
4940 }
4941 break;
4942 }
4943 case XVCVUXDDP: {
4944 int t = instr->RTValue();
4945 int b = instr->RBValue();
4946 FOR_EACH_LANE(i, uint64_t) {
4947 uint64_t b_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<uint64_t>(b, i);
4948 set_simd_register_by_lane<double>(t, i, static_cast<double>(b_val));
4949 }
4950 break;
4951 }
4952 case XVCVSPDP: {
4953 int t = instr->RTValue();
4954 int b = instr->RBValue();
4955 FOR_EACH_LANE(i, double) {
4956 float b_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<float>(b, 2 * i);
4957 set_simd_register_by_lane<double>(t, i, static_cast<double>(b_val));
4958 }
4959 break;
4960 }
4961 case XVCVDPSP: {
4962 int t = instr->RTValue();
4963 int b = instr->RBValue();
4964 FOR_EACH_LANE(i, double) {
4965 double b_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<double>(b, i);
4966 set_simd_register_by_lane<float>(t, 2 * i, static_cast<float>(b_val));
4967 }
4968 break;
4969 }
4970 case XSCVSPDPN: {
4971 int t = instr->RTValue();
4972 int b = instr->RBValue();
4973 uint64_t double_bits = get_d_register(b);
4974 // Value is at the high 32 bits of the register.
4975 float f = base::bit_cast<float, uint32_t>(
4976 static_cast<uint32_t>(double_bits >> 32));
4977 double_bits = base::bit_cast<uint64_t, double>(static_cast<double>(f));
4978 // Preserve snan.
4979 if (is_snan(f)) {
4980 double_bits &= 0xFFF7FFFFFFFFFFFFU; // Clear bit 51.
4981 }
4982 set_d_register(t, double_bits);
4983 break;
4984 }
4985 case XSCVDPSPN: {
4986 int t = instr->RTValue();
4987 int b = instr->RBValue();
4988 double b_val = get_double_from_d_register(b);
4989 uint64_t float_bits = static_cast<uint64_t>(
4990 base::bit_cast<uint32_t, float>(static_cast<float>(b_val)));
4991 // Preserve snan.
4992 if (is_snan(b_val)) {
4993 float_bits &= 0xFFBFFFFFU; // Clear bit 22.
4994 }
4995 // fp result is placed in both 32bit halfs of the dst.
4996 float_bits = (float_bits << 32) | float_bits;
4997 set_d_register(t, float_bits);
4998 break;
4999 }
5000#define VECTOR_UNPACK(S, D, if_high_side) \
5001 int t = instr->RTValue(); \
5002 int b = instr->RBValue(); \
5003 constexpr size_t kItemCount = kSimd128Size / sizeof(D); \
5004 D temps[kItemCount] = {0}; \
5005 /* Avoid overwriting src if src and dst are the same register. */ \
5006 FOR_EACH_LANE(i, D) { \
5007 temps[i] = get_simd_register_by_lane<S>(b, i, if_high_side); \
5008 } \
5009 FOR_EACH_LANE(i, D) { \
5010 set_simd_register_by_lane<D>(t, i, temps[i], if_high_side); \
5011 }
5012 case VUPKHSB: {
5013 VECTOR_UNPACK(int8_t, int16_t, true)
5014 break;
5015 }
5016 case VUPKHSH: {
5017 VECTOR_UNPACK(int16_t, int32_t, true)
5018 break;
5019 }
5020 case VUPKHSW: {
5021 VECTOR_UNPACK(int32_t, int64_t, true)
5022 break;
5023 }
5024 case VUPKLSB: {
5025 VECTOR_UNPACK(int8_t, int16_t, false)
5026 break;
5027 }
5028 case VUPKLSH: {
5029 VECTOR_UNPACK(int16_t, int32_t, false)
5030 break;
5031 }
5032 case VUPKLSW: {
5033 VECTOR_UNPACK(int32_t, int64_t, false)
5034 break;
5035 }
5036#undef VECTOR_UNPACK
5037 case VPKSWSS: {
5038 VectorPackSaturate<int32_t, int16_t>(this, instr, kMinInt16, kMaxInt16);
5039 break;
5040 }
5041 case VPKSWUS: {
5042 VectorPackSaturate<int32_t, uint16_t>(this, instr, 0, kMaxUInt16);
5043 break;
5044 }
5045 case VPKSHSS: {
5046 VectorPackSaturate<int16_t, int8_t>(this, instr, kMinInt8, kMaxInt8);
5047 break;
5048 }
5049 case VPKSHUS: {
5050 VectorPackSaturate<int16_t, uint8_t>(this, instr, 0, kMaxUInt8);
5051 break;
5052 }
5053#define VECTOR_ADD_SUB_SATURATE(intermediate_type, result_type, op, min_val, \
5054 max_val) \
5055 DECODE_VX_INSTRUCTION(t, a, b, T) \
5056 FOR_EACH_LANE(i, result_type) { \
5057 intermediate_type a_val = static_cast<intermediate_type>( \
5058 get_simd_register_by_lane<result_type>(a, i)); \
5059 intermediate_type b_val = static_cast<intermediate_type>( \
5060 get_simd_register_by_lane<result_type>(b, i)); \
5061 intermediate_type t_val = a_val op b_val; \
5062 if (t_val > max_val) \
5063 t_val = max_val; \
5064 else if (t_val < min_val) \
5065 t_val = min_val; \
5066 set_simd_register_by_lane<result_type>(t, i, \
5067 static_cast<result_type>(t_val)); \
5068 }
5069 case VADDSHS: {
5070 VECTOR_ADD_SUB_SATURATE(int32_t, int16_t, +, kMinInt16, kMaxInt16)
5071 break;
5072 }
5073 case VSUBSHS: {
5074 VECTOR_ADD_SUB_SATURATE(int32_t, int16_t, -, kMinInt16, kMaxInt16)
5075 break;
5076 }
5077 case VADDUHS: {
5078 VECTOR_ADD_SUB_SATURATE(int32_t, uint16_t, +, 0, kMaxUInt16)
5079 break;
5080 }
5081 case VSUBUHS: {
5082 VECTOR_ADD_SUB_SATURATE(int32_t, uint16_t, -, 0, kMaxUInt16)
5083 break;
5084 }
5085 case VADDSBS: {
5086 VECTOR_ADD_SUB_SATURATE(int16_t, int8_t, +, kMinInt8, kMaxInt8)
5087 break;
5088 }
5089 case VSUBSBS: {
5090 VECTOR_ADD_SUB_SATURATE(int16_t, int8_t, -, kMinInt8, kMaxInt8)
5091 break;
5092 }
5093 case VADDUBS: {
5094 VECTOR_ADD_SUB_SATURATE(int16_t, uint8_t, +, 0, kMaxUInt8)
5095 break;
5096 }
5097 case VSUBUBS: {
5098 VECTOR_ADD_SUB_SATURATE(int16_t, uint8_t, -, 0, kMaxUInt8)
5099 break;
5100 }
5101#undef VECTOR_ADD_SUB_SATURATE
5102#define VECTOR_FP_ROUNDING(type, op) \
5103 int t = instr->RTValue(); \
5104 int b = instr->RBValue(); \
5105 FOR_EACH_LANE(i, type) { \
5106 type b_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<type>(b, i); \
5107 set_simd_register_by_lane<type>(t, i, std::op(b_val)); \
5108 }
5109 case XVRDPIP: {
5110 VECTOR_FP_ROUNDING(double, ceil)
5111 break;
5112 }
5113 case XVRDPIM: {
5114 VECTOR_FP_ROUNDING(double, floor)
5115 break;
5116 }
5117 case XVRDPIZ: {
5118 VECTOR_FP_ROUNDING(double, trunc)
5119 break;
5120 }
5121 case XVRDPI: {
5122 VECTOR_FP_ROUNDING(double, nearbyint)
5123 break;
5124 }
5125 case XVRSPIP: {
5126 VECTOR_FP_ROUNDING(float, ceilf)
5127 break;
5128 }
5129 case XVRSPIM: {
5130 VECTOR_FP_ROUNDING(float, floorf)
5131 break;
5132 }
5133 case XVRSPIZ: {
5134 VECTOR_FP_ROUNDING(float, truncf)
5135 break;
5136 }
5137 case XVRSPI: {
5138 VECTOR_FP_ROUNDING(float, nearbyintf)
5139 break;
5140 }
5141#undef VECTOR_FP_ROUNDING
5142 case VSEL: {
5143 int vrt = instr->RTValue();
5144 int vra = instr->RAValue();
5145 int vrb = instr->RBValue();
5146 int vrc = instr->RCValue();
5147 unsigned __int128 src_1 =
5148 base::bit_cast<__int128>(get_simd_register(vra).int8);
5149 unsigned __int128 src_2 =
5150 base::bit_cast<__int128>(get_simd_register(vrb).int8);
5151 unsigned __int128 src_3 =
5152 base::bit_cast<__int128>(get_simd_register(vrc).int8);
5153 unsigned __int128 tmp = (src_1 & ~src_3) | (src_2 & src_3);
5154 simdr_t* result = reinterpret_cast<simdr_t*>(&tmp);
5155 set_simd_register(vrt, *result);
5156 break;
5157 }
5158 case VPERM: {
5159 int vrt = instr->RTValue();
5160 int vra = instr->RAValue();
5161 int vrb = instr->RBValue();
5162 int vrc = instr->RCValue();
5163 int8_t temp[kSimd128Size] = {0};
5164 FOR_EACH_LANE(i, int8_t) {
5165 int8_t lane_num = get_simd_register_by_lane<int8_t>(vrc, i);
5166 // Get the five least significant bits.
5167 lane_num = (lane_num << 3) >> 3;
5168 int reg = vra;
5169 if (lane_num >= kSimd128Size) {
5170 lane_num = lane_num - kSimd128Size;
5171 reg = vrb;
5172 }
5173 temp[i] = get_simd_register_by_lane<int8_t>(reg, lane_num);
5174 }
5175 FOR_EACH_LANE(i, int8_t) {
5176 set_simd_register_by_lane<int8_t>(vrt, i, temp[i]);
5177 }
5178 break;
5179 }
5180 case VBPERMQ: {
5181 DECODE_VX_INSTRUCTION(t, a, b, T)
5182 uint16_t result_bits = 0;
5183 unsigned __int128 src_bits =
5184 base::bit_cast<__int128>(get_simd_register(a).int8);
5185 for (int i = 0; i < kSimd128Size; i++) {
5186 result_bits <<= 1;
5187 uint8_t selected_bit_index = get_simd_register_by_lane<uint8_t>(b, i);
5188 if (selected_bit_index < (kSimd128Size * kBitsPerByte)) {
5189 unsigned __int128 bit_value = (src_bits << selected_bit_index) >>
5190 (kSimd128Size * kBitsPerByte - 1);
5191 result_bits |= bit_value;
5192 }
5193 }
5194 set_simd_register_by_lane<uint64_t>(t, 0, 0);
5195 set_simd_register_by_lane<uint64_t>(t, 1, 0);
5196 set_simd_register_by_lane<uint16_t>(t, 3, result_bits);
5197 break;
5198 }
5199#define VECTOR_FP_QF(type, sign) \
5200 DECODE_VX_INSTRUCTION(t, a, b, T) \
5201 FOR_EACH_LANE(i, type) { \
5202 type a_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<type>(a, i); \
5203 type b_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<type>(b, i); \
5204 type t_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<type>(t, i); \
5205 type reuslt = sign * ((sign * b_val) + (a_val * t_val)); \
5206 if (isinf(a_val)) reuslt = a_val; \
5207 if (isinf(b_val)) reuslt = b_val; \
5208 if (isinf(t_val)) reuslt = t_val; \
5209 set_simd_register_by_lane<type>(t, i, reuslt); \
5210 }
5211 case XVMADDMDP: {
5212 VECTOR_FP_QF(double, +1)
5213 break;
5214 }
5215 case XVNMSUBMDP: {
5216 VECTOR_FP_QF(double, -1)
5217 break;
5218 }
5219 case XVMADDMSP: {
5220 VECTOR_FP_QF(float, +1)
5221 break;
5222 }
5223 case XVNMSUBMSP: {
5224 VECTOR_FP_QF(float, -1)
5225 break;
5226 }
5227#undef VECTOR_FP_QF
5228 case VMHRADDSHS: {
5229 int vrt = instr->RTValue();
5230 int vra = instr->RAValue();
5231 int vrb = instr->RBValue();
5232 int vrc = instr->RCValue();
5233 FOR_EACH_LANE(i, int16_t) {
5234 int16_t vra_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<int16_t>(vra, i);
5235 int16_t vrb_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<int16_t>(vrb, i);
5236 int16_t vrc_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<int16_t>(vrc, i);
5237 int32_t temp = vra_val * vrb_val;
5238 temp = (temp + 0x00004000) >> 15;
5239 temp += vrc_val;
5240 if (temp > kMaxInt16)
5241 temp = kMaxInt16;
5242 else if (temp < kMinInt16)
5243 temp = kMinInt16;
5244 set_simd_register_by_lane<int16_t>(vrt, i, static_cast<int16_t>(temp));
5245 }
5246 break;
5247 }
5248 case VMSUMMBM: {
5249 int vrt = instr->RTValue();
5250 int vra = instr->RAValue();
5251 int vrb = instr->RBValue();
5252 int vrc = instr->RCValue();
5253 FOR_EACH_LANE(i, int32_t) {
5254 int8_t vra_1_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<int8_t>(vra, 4 * i),
5255 vra_2_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<int8_t>(vra, (4 * i) + 1),
5256 vra_3_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<int8_t>(vra, (4 * i) + 2),
5257 vra_4_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<int8_t>(vra, (4 * i) + 3);
5258 uint8_t vrb_1_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<uint8_t>(vrb, 4 * i),
5259 vrb_2_val =
5260 get_simd_register_by_lane<uint8_t>(vrb, (4 * i) + 1),
5261 vrb_3_val =
5262 get_simd_register_by_lane<uint8_t>(vrb, (4 * i) + 2),
5263 vrb_4_val =
5264 get_simd_register_by_lane<uint8_t>(vrb, (4 * i) + 3);
5265 int32_t vrc_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<int32_t>(vrc, i);
5266 int32_t temp1 = vra_1_val * vrb_1_val, temp2 = vra_2_val * vrb_2_val,
5267 temp3 = vra_3_val * vrb_3_val, temp4 = vra_4_val * vrb_4_val;
5268 temp1 = temp1 + temp2 + temp3 + temp4 + vrc_val;
5269 set_simd_register_by_lane<int32_t>(vrt, i, temp1);
5270 }
5271 break;
5272 }
5273 case VMSUMSHM: {
5274 int vrt = instr->RTValue();
5275 int vra = instr->RAValue();
5276 int vrb = instr->RBValue();
5277 int vrc = instr->RCValue();
5278 FOR_EACH_LANE(i, int32_t) {
5279 int16_t vra_1_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<int16_t>(vra, 2 * i);
5280 int16_t vra_2_val =
5281 get_simd_register_by_lane<int16_t>(vra, (2 * i) + 1);
5282 int16_t vrb_1_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<int16_t>(vrb, 2 * i);
5283 int16_t vrb_2_val =
5284 get_simd_register_by_lane<int16_t>(vrb, (2 * i) + 1);
5285 int32_t vrc_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<int32_t>(vrc, i);
5286 int32_t temp1 = vra_1_val * vrb_1_val, temp2 = vra_2_val * vrb_2_val;
5287 temp1 = temp1 + temp2 + vrc_val;
5288 set_simd_register_by_lane<int32_t>(vrt, i, temp1);
5289 }
5290 break;
5291 }
5292 case VMLADDUHM: {
5293 int vrt = instr->RTValue();
5294 int vra = instr->RAValue();
5295 int vrb = instr->RBValue();
5296 int vrc = instr->RCValue();
5297 FOR_EACH_LANE(i, uint16_t) {
5298 uint16_t vra_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<uint16_t>(vra, i);
5299 uint16_t vrb_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<uint16_t>(vrb, i);
5300 uint16_t vrc_val = get_simd_register_by_lane<uint16_t>(vrc, i);
5301 set_simd_register_by_lane<uint16_t>(vrt, i,
5302 (vra_val * vrb_val) + vrc_val);
5303 }
5304 break;
5305 }
5306#define VECTOR_UNARY_OP(type, op) \
5307 int t = instr->RTValue(); \
5308 int b = instr->RBValue(); \
5309 FOR_EACH_LANE(i, type) { \
5310 set_simd_register_by_lane<type>( \
5311 t, i, op(get_simd_register_by_lane<type>(b, i))); \
5312 }
5313 case XVABSDP: {
5314 VECTOR_UNARY_OP(double, std::abs)
5315 break;
5316 }
5317 case XVNEGDP: {
5318 VECTOR_UNARY_OP(double, -)
5319 break;
5320 }
5321 case XVSQRTDP: {
5322 VECTOR_UNARY_OP(double, std::sqrt)
5323 break;
5324 }
5325 case XVABSSP: {
5326 VECTOR_UNARY_OP(float, std::abs)
5327 break;
5328 }
5329 case XVNEGSP: {
5330 VECTOR_UNARY_OP(float, -)
5331 break;
5332 }
5333 case XVSQRTSP: {
5334 VECTOR_UNARY_OP(float, std::sqrt)
5335 break;
5336 }
5337 case XVRESP: {
5338 VECTOR_UNARY_OP(float, base::Recip)
5339 break;
5340 }
5341 case XVRSQRTESP: {
5342 VECTOR_UNARY_OP(float, base::RecipSqrt)
5343 break;
5344 }
5345 case VNEGW: {
5346 VECTOR_UNARY_OP(int32_t, -)
5347 break;
5348 }
5349 case VNEGD: {
5350 VECTOR_UNARY_OP(int64_t, -)
5351 break;
5352 }
5353#undef VECTOR_UNARY_OP
5354#define VECTOR_ROUNDING_AVERAGE(intermediate_type, result_type) \
5355 DECODE_VX_INSTRUCTION(t, a, b, T) \
5356 FOR_EACH_LANE(i, result_type) { \
5357 intermediate_type a_val = static_cast<intermediate_type>( \
5358 get_simd_register_by_lane<result_type>(a, i)); \
5359 intermediate_type b_val = static_cast<intermediate_type>( \
5360 get_simd_register_by_lane<result_type>(b, i)); \
5361 intermediate_type t_val = ((a_val + b_val) + 1) >> 1; \
5362 set_simd_register_by_lane<result_type>(t, i, \
5363 static_cast<result_type>(t_val)); \
5364 }
5365 case VAVGUH: {
5366 VECTOR_ROUNDING_AVERAGE(uint32_t, uint16_t)
5367 break;
5368 }
5369 case VAVGUB: {
5370 VECTOR_ROUNDING_AVERAGE(uint16_t, uint8_t)
5371 break;
5372 }
5373#undef VECTOR_ROUNDING_AVERAGE
5374 case VPOPCNTB: {
5375 int t = instr->RTValue();
5376 int b = instr->RBValue();
5377 FOR_EACH_LANE(i, uint8_t) {
5378 set_simd_register_by_lane<uint8_t>(
5379 t, i,
5380 base::bits::CountPopulation(
5381 get_simd_register_by_lane<uint8_t>(b, i)));
5382 }
5383 break;
5384 }
5385#define EXTRACT_MASK(type) \
5386 int rt = instr->RTValue(); \
5387 int vrb = instr->RBValue(); \
5388 uint64_t result = 0; \
5389 FOR_EACH_LANE(i, type) { \
5390 if (i > 0) result <<= 1; \
5391 result |= std::signbit(get_simd_register_by_lane<type>(vrb, i)); \
5392 } \
5393 set_register(rt, result);
5394 case VEXTRACTDM: {
5395 EXTRACT_MASK(int64_t)
5396 break;
5397 }
5398 case VEXTRACTWM: {
5399 EXTRACT_MASK(int32_t)
5400 break;
5401 }
5402 case VEXTRACTHM: {
5403 EXTRACT_MASK(int16_t)
5404 break;
5405 }
5406 case VEXTRACTBM: {
5407 EXTRACT_MASK(int8_t)
5408 break;
5409 }
5410#undef EXTRACT_MASK
5411#undef FOR_EACH_LANE
5412#undef DECODE_VX_INSTRUCTION
5413#undef GET_ADDRESS
5414 default: {
5415 UNIMPLEMENTED();
5416 }
5417 }
5418}
5419
5420void Simulator::Trace(Instruction* instr) {
5421 disasm::NameConverter converter;
5422 disasm::Disassembler dasm(converter);
5423 // use a reasonably large buffer
5424 v8::base::EmbeddedVector<char, 256> buffer;
5425 dasm.InstructionDecode(buffer, reinterpret_cast<uint8_t*>(instr));
5426 PrintF("%05d %08" V8PRIxPTR " %s\n", icount_,
5427 reinterpret_cast<intptr_t>(instr), buffer.begin());
5428}
5429
5430// Executes the current instruction.
5431void Simulator::ExecuteInstruction(Instruction* instr) {
5432 if (v8_flags.check_icache) {
5433 CheckICache(i_cache(), instr);
5434 }
5435 pc_modified_ = false;
5436 if (v8_flags.trace_sim) {
5437 Trace(instr);
5438 }
5439 uint32_t opcode = instr->OpcodeField();
5440 if (opcode == TWI) {
5441 SoftwareInterrupt(instr);
5442 } else {
5443 ExecuteGeneric(instr);
5444 }
5445 if (!pc_modified_) {
5446 set_pc(reinterpret_cast<intptr_t>(instr) + kInstrSize);
5447 }
5448}
5449
5450void Simulator::Execute() {
5451 // Get the PC to simulate. Cannot use the accessor here as we need the
5452 // raw PC value and not the one used as input to arithmetic instructions.
5453 intptr_t program_counter = get_pc();
5454
5455 if (v8_flags.stop_sim_at == 0) {
5456 // Fast version of the dispatch loop without checking whether the simulator
5457 // should be stopping at a particular executed instruction.
5458 while (program_counter != end_sim_pc) {
5459 Instruction* instr = reinterpret_cast<Instruction*>(program_counter);
5460 icount_++;
5461 ExecuteInstruction(instr);
5462 program_counter = get_pc();
5463 }
5464 } else {
5465 // v8_flags.stop_sim_at is at the non-default value. Stop in the debugger
5466 // when we reach the particular instruction count.
5467 while (program_counter != end_sim_pc) {
5468 Instruction* instr = reinterpret_cast<Instruction*>(program_counter);
5469 icount_++;
5470 if (icount_ == v8_flags.stop_sim_at) {
5471 PPCDebugger dbg(this);
5472 dbg.Debug();
5473 } else {
5474 ExecuteInstruction(instr);
5475 }
5476 program_counter = get_pc();
5477 }
5478 }
5479}
5480
5481void Simulator::CallInternal(Address entry) {
5482 // Adjust JS-based stack limit to C-based stack limit.
5483 isolate_->stack_guard()->AdjustStackLimitForSimulator();
5484
5485 // Prepare to execute the code at entry
5486 if (ABI_USES_FUNCTION_DESCRIPTORS) {
5487 // entry is the function descriptor
5488 set_pc(*(reinterpret_cast<intptr_t*>(entry)));
5489 } else {
5490 // entry is the instruction address
5491 set_pc(static_cast<intptr_t>(entry));
5492 }
5493
5494 if (ABI_CALL_VIA_IP) {
5495 // Put target address in ip (for JS prologue).
5496 set_register(r12, get_pc());
5497 }
5498
5499 // Put down marker for end of simulation. The simulator will stop simulation
5500 // when the PC reaches this value. By saving the "end simulation" value into
5501 // the LR the simulation stops when returning to this call point.
5502 special_reg_lr_ = end_sim_pc;
5503
5504 // Remember the values of non-volatile registers.
5505 intptr_t r2_val = get_register(r2);
5506 intptr_t r13_val = get_register(r13);
5507 intptr_t r14_val = get_register(r14);
5508 intptr_t r15_val = get_register(r15);
5509 intptr_t r16_val = get_register(r16);
5510 intptr_t r17_val = get_register(r17);
5511 intptr_t r18_val = get_register(r18);
5512 intptr_t r19_val = get_register(r19);
5513 intptr_t r20_val = get_register(r20);
5514 intptr_t r21_val = get_register(r21);
5515 intptr_t r22_val = get_register(r22);
5516 intptr_t r23_val = get_register(r23);
5517 intptr_t r24_val = get_register(r24);
5518 intptr_t r25_val = get_register(r25);
5519 intptr_t r26_val = get_register(r26);
5520 intptr_t r27_val = get_register(r27);
5521 intptr_t r28_val = get_register(r28);
5522 intptr_t r29_val = get_register(r29);
5523 intptr_t r30_val = get_register(r30);
5524 intptr_t r31_val = get_register(fp);
5525
5526 // Set up the non-volatile registers with a known value. To be able to check
5527 // that they are preserved properly across JS execution.
5528 intptr_t callee_saved_value = icount_;
5529 set_register(r2, callee_saved_value);
5530 set_register(r13, callee_saved_value);
5531 set_register(r14, callee_saved_value);
5532 set_register(r15, callee_saved_value);
5533 set_register(r16, callee_saved_value);
5534 set_register(r17, callee_saved_value);
5535 set_register(r18, callee_saved_value);
5536 set_register(r19, callee_saved_value);
5537 set_register(r20, callee_saved_value);
5538 set_register(r21, callee_saved_value);
5539 set_register(r22, callee_saved_value);
5540 set_register(r23, callee_saved_value);
5541 set_register(r24, callee_saved_value);
5542 set_register(r25, callee_saved_value);
5543 set_register(r26, callee_saved_value);
5544 set_register(r27, callee_saved_value);
5545 set_register(r28, callee_saved_value);
5546 set_register(r29, callee_saved_value);
5547 set_register(r30, callee_saved_value);
5548 set_register(fp, callee_saved_value);
5549
5550 // Start the simulation
5551 Execute();
5552
5553 // Check that the non-volatile registers have been preserved.
5554 if (ABI_TOC_REGISTER != 2) {
5555 CHECK_EQ(callee_saved_value, get_register(r2));
5556 }
5557 if (ABI_TOC_REGISTER != 13) {
5558 CHECK_EQ(callee_saved_value, get_register(r13));
5559 }
5560 CHECK_EQ(callee_saved_value, get_register(r14));
5561 CHECK_EQ(callee_saved_value, get_register(r15));
5562 CHECK_EQ(callee_saved_value, get_register(r16));
5563 CHECK_EQ(callee_saved_value, get_register(r17));
5564 CHECK_EQ(callee_saved_value, get_register(r18));
5565 CHECK_EQ(callee_saved_value, get_register(r19));
5566 CHECK_EQ(callee_saved_value, get_register(r20));
5567 CHECK_EQ(callee_saved_value, get_register(r21));
5568 CHECK_EQ(callee_saved_value, get_register(r22));
5569 CHECK_EQ(callee_saved_value, get_register(r23));
5570 CHECK_EQ(callee_saved_value, get_register(r24));
5571 CHECK_EQ(callee_saved_value, get_register(r25));
5572 CHECK_EQ(callee_saved_value, get_register(r26));
5573 CHECK_EQ(callee_saved_value, get_register(r27));
5574 CHECK_EQ(callee_saved_value, get_register(r28));
5575 CHECK_EQ(callee_saved_value, get_register(r29));
5576 CHECK_EQ(callee_saved_value, get_register(r30));
5577 CHECK_EQ(callee_saved_value, get_register(fp));
5578
5579 // Restore non-volatile registers with the original value.
5580 set_register(r2, r2_val);
5581 set_register(r13, r13_val);
5582 set_register(r14, r14_val);
5583 set_register(r15, r15_val);
5584 set_register(r16, r16_val);
5585 set_register(r17, r17_val);
5586 set_register(r18, r18_val);
5587 set_register(r19, r19_val);
5588 set_register(r20, r20_val);
5589 set_register(r21, r21_val);
5590 set_register(r22, r22_val);
5591 set_register(r23, r23_val);
5592 set_register(r24, r24_val);
5593 set_register(r25, r25_val);
5594 set_register(r26, r26_val);
5595 set_register(r27, r27_val);
5596 set_register(r28, r28_val);
5597 set_register(r29, r29_val);
5598 set_register(r30, r30_val);
5599 set_register(fp, r31_val);
5600}
5601
5602intptr_t Simulator::CallImpl(Address entry, int argument_count,
5603 const intptr_t* arguments) {
5604 // Set up arguments
5605
5606 // First eight arguments passed in registers r3-r10.
5607 int reg_arg_count = std::min(8, argument_count);
5608 int stack_arg_count = argument_count - reg_arg_count;
5609 for (int i = 0; i < reg_arg_count; i++) {
5610 set_register(i + 3, arguments[i]);
5611 }
5612
5613 // Remaining arguments passed on stack.
5614 intptr_t original_stack = get_register(sp);
5615 // Compute position of stack on entry to generated code.
5616 intptr_t entry_stack =
5617 (original_stack -
5618 (kNumRequiredStackFrameSlots + stack_arg_count) * sizeof(intptr_t));
5619 if (base::OS::ActivationFrameAlignment() != 0) {
5620 entry_stack &= -base::OS::ActivationFrameAlignment();
5621 }
5622 // Store remaining arguments on stack, from low to high memory.
5623 // +2 is a hack for the LR slot + old SP on PPC
5624 intptr_t* stack_argument =
5625 reinterpret_cast<intptr_t*>(entry_stack) + kStackFrameExtraParamSlot;
5626 memcpy(stack_argument, arguments + reg_arg_count,
5627 stack_arg_count * sizeof(*arguments));
5628 set_register(sp, entry_stack);
5629
5630 CallInternal(entry);
5631
5632 // Pop stack passed arguments.
5633 CHECK_EQ(entry_stack, get_register(sp));
5634 set_register(sp, original_stack);
5635
5636 return get_register(r3);
5637}
5638
5639void Simulator::CallFP(Address entry, double d0, double d1) {
5640 set_d_register_from_double(1, d0);
5641 set_d_register_from_double(2, d1);
5642 CallInternal(entry);
5643}
5644
5645int32_t Simulator::CallFPReturnsInt(Address entry, double d0, double d1) {
5646 CallFP(entry, d0, d1);
5647 int32_t result = get_register(r3);
5648 return result;
5649}
5650
5651double Simulator::CallFPReturnsDouble(Address entry, double d0, double d1) {
5652 CallFP(entry, d0, d1);
5653 return get_double_from_d_register(1);
5654}
5655
5656uintptr_t Simulator::PushAddress(uintptr_t address) {
5657 uintptr_t new_sp = get_register(sp) - sizeof(uintptr_t);
5658 uintptr_t* stack_slot = reinterpret_cast<uintptr_t*>(new_sp);
5659 *stack_slot = address;
5660 set_register(sp, new_sp);
5661 return new_sp;
5662}
5663
5664uintptr_t Simulator::PopAddress() {
5665 uintptr_t current_sp = get_register(sp);
5666 uintptr_t* stack_slot = reinterpret_cast<uintptr_t*>(current_sp);
5667 uintptr_t address = *stack_slot;
5668 set_register(sp, current_sp + sizeof(uintptr_t));
5669 return address;
5670}
5671
5672void Simulator::GlobalMonitor::Clear() {
5673 access_state_ = MonitorAccess::Open;
5674 tagged_addr_ = 0;
5675 size_ = TransactionSize::None;
5676 thread_id_ = ThreadId::Invalid();
5677}
5678
5679void Simulator::GlobalMonitor::NotifyLoadExcl(uintptr_t addr,
5680 TransactionSize size,
5681 ThreadId thread_id) {
5682 // TODO(s390): By using Global Monitors, we are effectively limiting one
5683 // active reservation across all processors. This would potentially serialize
5684 // parallel threads executing load&reserve + store conditional on unrelated
5685 // memory. Technically, this implementation would still make the simulator
5686 // adhere to the spec, but seems overly heavy-handed.
5687 access_state_ = MonitorAccess::Exclusive;
5688 tagged_addr_ = addr;
5689 size_ = size;
5690 thread_id_ = thread_id;
5691}
5692
5693void Simulator::GlobalMonitor::NotifyStore(uintptr_t addr, TransactionSize size,
5694 ThreadId thread_id) {
5695 if (access_state_ == MonitorAccess::Exclusive) {
5696 // Calculate if the transaction has been overlapped
5697 uintptr_t transaction_start = addr;
5698 uintptr_t transaction_end = addr + static_cast<uintptr_t>(size);
5699 uintptr_t exclusive_transaction_start = tagged_addr_;
5700 uintptr_t exclusive_transaction_end =
5701 tagged_addr_ + static_cast<uintptr_t>(size_);
5702 bool is_not_overlapped = transaction_end < exclusive_transaction_start ||
5703 exclusive_transaction_end < transaction_start;
5704 if (!is_not_overlapped && thread_id_ != thread_id) {
5705 Clear();
5706 }
5707 }
5708}
5709
5710bool Simulator::GlobalMonitor::NotifyStoreExcl(uintptr_t addr,
5711 TransactionSize size,
5712 ThreadId thread_id) {
5713 bool permission = access_state_ == MonitorAccess::Exclusive &&
5714 addr == tagged_addr_ && size_ == size &&
5715 thread_id_ == thread_id;
5716 // The reservation is cleared if the processor holding the reservation
5717 // executes a store conditional instruction to any address.
5718 Clear();
5719 return permission;
5720}
